post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Java Developer
About the Job
We have a client in the downtown area looking to bring on Java / J2EE Developer in a permanent capacity.


Minimum of 3+ years experience building custom interfaces with prior development experience with:

·         Java

·         web development

·         JSP w/ JSTL,

·         HTML / JavaScript / JQuery / CSS JDBC

·         Oracle

·         Tomcat / WebSphere would be preferred

·         Financial Industry experience preferred




The TAL Group is providing Android training courses starting February 2010



Please go to talgroup.​ca for more info or call 416 599 1825
post.title: Web/Java Developer -TAL Group Inc
